channel.title: Players cannot see each other?
channel.description:
Check this out? thanks: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/help/460682-players-cannot-see-each-other.html
I don't understand how I'm not sending player updating the right way... It was fine until I applied the thread per client removal. :/
